dashboard.label: Process Flow Diagram Sample 1
dashboard.description: Sample based on datasets from https://github.com/pm4py/pm4py-bpmn

search.query: | inputlookup road-traffic.csv | sort -time:timestamp | rename concept:name as Step, case:concept:name as corrID, time:timestamp as timestamp | eval _time = strptime(timestamp,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") | streamstats window=2 first(_time) as NextStepTime, last(_time) as StepTime, first(Step) as NextStep, first(corrID) as NextID | eval duration_seconds = if(corrID != NextID, 0,((NextStepTime - StepTime) / 60 / 60) ) | where duration_seconds > 0 | table corrID Step NextStep duration_seconds
